disallow.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to officially refuse to accept something, because a rule has been broken
disallow.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Manchester United had a goal disallowed.
disallow.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to officially refuse to allow or accept something
disallow.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The court will examine the costs and expenses sought and disallow those that it considers have not been ‘properly incurred’.
